column5: Had to share....just too cute.  Jack has chosen to be Superman this year for halloween.
Did ya get Mom the Wonderwomen costume as well ??

Faster than a speeding ice cream truck Stonger then any toy packaging and able to leap every puddle on the road  Great costume Jack (pssst you know these pictures are going to come back and haunt you on your wedding day)
lol, awesome pics Simon!  Boy is Jack growing up fast!!!!
Cool pics Simon  Your little man sure is growing fast! Thanks for sharing Jacques
What a cute little superman he is  Chuck Norris can't touch him
